title: How do I get a hold of Google Pixel directly
content: I need to speak to Google and I've been trying to get ahold of him for a month now and I cannot get a hold of anybody and no one to return me I own a Google Pixel 3 XL and I've had problems with one button and I need to speak to somebody in regards to this and I cannot get a hold of anybody to contact me back or contact them could somebody please recommend something for me Thank you very much
